item.title: Skycoin Community Links
item.description: Talk with the Skycoin Team The Skycoin team is most active on Telegram. Skycoin Telegram Channel Skycoin BBS Channel Skycoin News Channel Skycoin Bounty Program Channel Skycoin Slack Skycoin Discord Mailing List Skycoin Mailing List News Updates Skycoin Blog Skycoin Twitter Skycoin Reddit Skycoin Facebook Media Skycoin Youtube Skycoin Instagram Software All code is published to github. Contributors and testers are encouraged.
